artist: Editor: Cecilia Tan et al.; Publisher: Circlet Press, Cambridge, Mass.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, text and an image of a woman dressed in black wearing necklaces, against an abstracted background of German text; 64 pp.
medium: Color offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: Fantastic Erotica: The Best of Circlet Press 2008 - 2012
